Blackbox Connect Summer 2013 powered by

Google for Entrepreneurs is powering this summer's program. Eight startups, nominated by Google for Entrepreneurs partner programs around the world, will participate in the Summer 2013 (July 15-26) program. To learn about Google for Entrepreneurs, or to grow your own skills through free online courses, visit Google for Entrepreneurs website and learn more on Google+.
